action.content: Write an XML document describing the release of the latest Google Pixel phone. The document must contain at least three placeholders, such as [price], and you must not use commas in your response.
action.label: context

action.content:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<phone-release>
  <model>Google Pixel 8</model>
  <release-date>September 2024</release-date>
  <features>
    <camera>
      <resolution>50MP</resolution>
      <features>
        <night-sight>Yes</night-sight>
        <portrait-mode>Yes</portrait-mode>
      </features>
    </camera>
    <battery>
      <capacity>4500mAh</capacity>
      <fast-charging>Yes</fast-charging>
    </battery>
  </features>
  <specifications>
    <processor>Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Gen 2</processor>
    <ram>12GB</ram>
    <storage>
      <options>128GB 256GB 512GB</options>
    </storage>
  </specifications>
  <pricing>
    <base-price>[price]</base-price>
    <storage-upgrades>
      <upgrade>128GB to 256GB: [price]</upgrade>
      <upgrade>256GB to 512GB: [price]</upgrade>
    </storage-upgrades>
  </pricing>
  <availability>
    <regions>US UK Australia Canada</regions>
    <release-method>Online and in-store</release-method>
  </availability>
</phone-release>
action.label: response
